name: table_schema_specs_for_c2m2_encoding_of_dcc_metadata
title: A complete list of schematic specifications for the resources (TSV table files) that will be used to represent C2M2 DCC metadata prior to ingest into the C2M2 database system

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.description: A CFDE-cleared identifier representing the top-level data space containing this file [part 1 of 2-component composite primary key]

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An identifier representing this file, unique within this id_namespace [part 2 of 2-component composite primary key]

fields.name: project_id_namespace
fields.description: The id_namespace of the primary project within which this file was created [part 1 of 2-component composite foreign key]

fields.name: project_local_id
fields.description: The local_id of the primary project within which this file was created [part 2 of 2-component composite foreign key]

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not necessarily retrievable) URI or compact ID permanently attached to this file

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this file's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSÂ±NN:NN

fields.name: size_in_bytes
fields.description: The size of this file in bytes

fields.name: uncompressed_size_in_bytes
fields.description: The total decompressed size in bytes of the contents of this file: null if this file is not compressed

fields.name: sha256
fields.description: (preferred) SHA-256 checksum for this file [sha256, md5 cannot both be null]

fields.name: md5
fields.description: (allowed) MD5 checksum for this file [sha256, md5 cannot both be null]

fields.name: filename
fields.description: A filename with no prepended PATH information

fields.name: file_format
fields.description: An EDAM CV term ID identifying the digital format of this file (e.g. TSV or FASTQ): if this file is compressed, this should be its _uncompressed_ format

fields.name: compression_format
fields.description: An EDAM CV term ID identifying the compression format of this file (e.g. gzip or bzip2): null if this file is not compressed

fields.name: data_type
fields.description: An EDAM CV term ID identifying the type of information stored in this file (e.g. RNA sequence reads): null if is_bundle is set to true

fields.name: assay_type
fields.description: An OBI CV term ID describing the type of experiment that generated the results summarized by this file

fields.name: analysis_type
fields.description: An OBI CV term ID describing the type of analytic operation that generated this file

fields.name: mime_type
fields.description: A MIME type describing this file

fields.name: bundle_collection_id_namespace
fields.description: If this file is a bundle encoding more than one sub-file, this field gives the id_namespace of a collection listing the bundle's sub-file contents; null otherwise

fields.name: bundle_collection_local_id
fields.description: If this file is a bundle encoding more than one sub-file, this field gives the local_id of a collection listing the bundle's sub-file contents; null otherwise

fields.name: dbgap_study_id
fields.description: The name of a dbGaP study ID governing access control for this file, compatible for comparison to RAS user-level access control metadata

fields.name: access_url
fields.description: A DRS URI or otherwise a publicly accessible DRS-compatible URL

resources.name: collection_protein
resources.title: collection_protein
resources.description: Association between a protein and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that protein

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

fields.name: protein
fields.description: A UniProtKB term ID describing this protein

resources.name: biosample_substance
resources.title: biosample_substance
resources.description: Association between a C2M2 biosample and a PubChem substance experimentally associated with that biosample

fields.name: biosample_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this biosample

fields.name: biosample_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this biosample

fields.name: substance
fields.description: A PubChem substance ID (SID) describing this substance

resources.name: anatomy
resources.title: anatomy
resources.description: List of Uber-anatomy ontology (UBERON) CV terms used to locate the origin of a C2M2 biosample within the physiology of its source or host organism

fields.name: id
fields.description: An UBERON CV term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this UBERON term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this UBERON term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the UBERON metadata
